title: Task 25

question.text: What is a common activity people might do with their desk at the start of a workday?

answers.feedback: Desks are not plants. They don't need water to grow. Try it again!

To organize means to arrange things in a structured manner or specific order. Tidy up means to make something neat and orderly. Both these actions are commonly done to a workspace or desk to prepare for tasks. Well done!
Desks are for working, not for cooking. They aren't heat-resistant like stovetops. Try it again!
Desks are furniture items, not wearable objects. You can't put on a desk like a shirt or pants. Try it again!

dialogue.text: Great. Let me show you to your desk.

description: A desk is often the central part of one's workspace, especially in an office setting. People typically use it to set up their computers, write, read, and do other work-related tasks.
